Sample.Title: HEK293T_GLORI+_rep1

Channel.Treatment-Protocol: Transfection was performed by Lipofectamin RNAiMAX for siRNA when HeLa cells were grown to 50% confluence. For heat shock, MEF cells were grown to 80% confluence in the 6-cm plastic dishes, placed in a 42°C water bath for 1 h, and then recover for 6 h at 37°C. For hypoxia treatment, HeLa cells were grown to 80% confluence, carried out in Hypoxia Hood which maintained at 37°C, 5% CO2, 1% oxygen for 24 h.
Channel.Growth-Protocol: HEK293T, MEF, HeLa cells were maintained in DMEM supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS) and antibiotics in humidified atmosphere with 5% CO2 at 37C
Channel.Extract-Protocol: mRNA was purified by oligo (dT) beads. 100-200 ng of mRNA was used for GLORI treatment and construction of sequencing libraries. RNA libraries were prepared using modified eCLIP library construction, NEBNext Small RNA library kits (NEB) and SMARTer Stranded Total RNA-Seq kits (v3) - Pico Input mammalian (Takara) Library Prep Kit following manufacturer's protocols.

Sample.Description: wildtype HEK293T cells with GLORI treatment
Sample.Data-Processing: Adapters and low-quality bases were trimmed with trim_galore (version 0.6.6). PCR duplications was removed with Seqkit. UMI were removed with FASTX-Toolkit (version 0.0.13). Clean reads were firstly mapped to the genome with STAR and then transcriptome with bowtie. Pileup was performed using samtools API pysam. Customized scripts were used to call m6A sites from samples. To make the analysis pipeline easy to implement, we developed GLORI-tools, a computational pipeline that quantifies the A rate of each A site and follows multiple filters for false positives. The code of the GLORI-tools is available in the following GitHub repositories: https://github.com/liucongcas/GLORI-tools. Assembly: GRCh38/GRCm38 Supplementary files format and content: Sequencing data from parallel untreated RNA-seq samples was used to assess gene expression level. Adapters and low-quality bases were trimmed with trim_galore (version 0.6.6). PCR duplications was removed with Seqkit. UMI were removed with FASTX-Toolkit (version 0.0.13). The cleaned reads were firstly mapped to the genome with STAR then the transcriptome with bowtie. Uniquely mapped reads were merged and sorted for calculating the expression level of genes. For each gene, reads coverage and gene length was calculated using featureCounts (version 2.0.3), and then RPKM value was calculated with a custom script. Genes with RPKM <1 were excluded from downstream analysis.

For heat shock, MEF cells were grown to 80% confluence in the 6-cm plastic dishes, placed in a 42°C water bath for 1 h, and then recover for 6 h at 37°C. For hypoxia treatment, HeLa cells were grown to 80% confluence, carried out in Hypoxia Hood which maintained at 37°C, 5% CO2, 1% oxygen for 24 h.
Channel.Growth-Protocol: HEK293T, MEF, HeLa cells were maintained in DMEM supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS) and antibiotics in humidified atmosphere with 5% CO2 at 37C
Channel.Extract-Protocol: mRNA was purified by oligo (dT) beads. 100-200 ng of mRNA was used for GLORI treatment and construction of sequencing libraries. RNA libraries were prepared using modified eCLIP library construction, NEBNext Small RNA library kits (NEB) and SMARTer Stranded Total RNA-Seq kits (v3) - Pico Input mammalian (Takara) Library Prep Kit following manufacturer's protocols.

Sample.Description: IVT RNA derived from HEK293T cells with GLORI treatment
Sample.Data-Processing: Adapters and low-quality bases were trimmed with trim_galore (version 0.6.6). PCR duplications was removed with Seqkit. UMI were removed with FASTX-Toolkit (version 0.0.13). Clean reads were firstly mapped to the genome with STAR and then transcriptome with bowtie. Pileup was performed using samtools API pysam. Customized scripts were used to call m6A sites from samples. To make the analysis pipeline easy to implement, we developed GLORI-tools, a computational pipeline that quantifies the A rate of each A site and follows multiple filters for false positives. The code of the GLORI-tools is available in the following GitHub repositories: https://github.com/liucongcas/GLORI-tools. Assembly: GRCh38/GRCm38 Supplementary files format and content: Sequencing data from parallel untreated RNA-seq samples was used to assess gene expression level. Adapters and low-quality bases were trimmed with trim_galore (version 0.6.6). PCR duplications was removed with Seqkit. UMI were removed with FASTX-Toolkit (version 0.0.13). The cleaned reads were firstly mapped to the genome with STAR then the transcriptome with bowtie. Uniquely mapped reads were merged and sorted for calculating the expression level of genes. For each gene, reads coverage and gene length was calculated using featureCounts (version 2.0.3), and then RPKM value was calculated with a custom script. Genes with RPKM <1 were excluded from downstream analysis.

Series.Title: Absolute quantification of single-base m6A methylation in the mammalian transcriptome
Series.Summary: To investigate the m6A methylation in the mammalian transcriptome, we developed a quantitative method, names GLORI, that could detect m6A stoichiometry at single-base resolution. We then performed GLORI on cells with different treatment, such as stress, knockdown and inhibitor. We next analysis m6A methyloms of different celllines and cells under different treatment to investigate the fuctional role of m6A.
Series.Overall-Design: Comparation m6A profiling analysis of RNA-seq data for HEK293T/HeLa/MEF/cells and its KD derivatives (Heatshock, hypoxia, siMETTL3, siMETTL14, siWTAP, siYTHDF2, and inhibition of METTL3).
Series.Type: Expression profiling by high throughput sequencing
